content.rendered:
Think it's too early to start booking your adventures for summer? Think again! Booking early has many benefits, namely pre-season prices and specials. Take advantage of spectacular savings when you book early. Here is a breakdown of all the deals AVA Rafting is currently offering to prepare you for your best summer ever:

  1. 50% Off Rafting for Raft/Zip Packages in Granite for 2016!
    Book your 2016 raft & zipline package now for 50% off the rafting portion of your trip! Use promo code 50RAFT16 on your full or 1/2 day rafting and zipline package at our Granite Outpost. The best part about this deal? The options are endless! If you are traveling with children as young as 7 years old, check out the Browns Canyon Half Day Package, Browns Canyon Express Package or the Browns Canyon Sizzler Package. Looking for something a little more intense? Try some intermediate to advanced whitewater rafting for ages 15 and up with the Numbers Half Day Package, the Pine Creek Half Day Package, the Gauntlet Package or the Numbers Wyldride Package. 

  2. 20% Off All May Trips in Granite!
    Take 20% off your rafting, zipline, rock climbing or package trip from our Granite Outpost for trips in May! Use promo code 20MAYARK to book this deal. 
     
  3. 20% Off Ziplining in Granite All Season Long!
    Save 20% on your Mountaintop Zipline Tour all season long from our Granite Outpost! Use promo code 20ZIPGRANITE to book.
     
  4. BOGO 1/2 Off Spring Ziplining in Idaho Springs!
    Buy a zipline tour for 1 at our Idaho Springs location and get a 2nd one for half price! Use promo code BOGOSPRINGZIP to book this incredible deal.
     
  5. Early Bird Group Discounts! Book your large group trip EARLY for higher discounts of up to 30% off!
    Early bird discount! Book your large group trip now for up to 30% off your trip! Group discounts are not available on Saturdays in June and July for trips from our Idaho Springs location on Clear Creek. Group discounts are not available on Saturdays in July and the last Saturday in June from our Granite location on the Arkansas River. Group discounts are available every day throughout the summer for trips from our Kremmling location on the Colorado River. For information, please contact our Group Sales Coordinator at groups@coloradorafting.net or 970-423-7031. Promo codes and discounts are dependent on group size:

    10-19 people: 15% Off with code EARLYGROUP15
    20-49 people: 20% Off with code EARLYGROUP20
    50+ people: 30% Off with code EARLYGROUP30

  6. $100 Off Deluxe Overnight Trips
    Try one of our Deluxe Overnight Trips to save $100 on a rafting, camping and zipline package! Use promo code DELUXE100. Try the 24 Hours in Browns Canyon Deluxe trip to experience Colorado’s best & most exclusive overnight whitewater rafting & ziplining trip! If you are looking for two full days of rafting excitement, with a relaxing night in between, followed by a half day of ziplining, the 2 Day Advanced Deluxe trip is the one for you! If you're ready for the ultimate overnight whitewater wilderness rafting experience with ziplining in Colorado, the 3 Day Mild to Wild Deluxe trip will not disappoint!
     
  7. $80 Off Standard Multiday Trips
    Book your 2016 multiday trip now for $80 off! Use promo code OVERNIGHT80 when you book an standard overnight trip, such as the 24 Hours in Browns Canyon or 2 Day Advanced trips. If you're looking for the most thrilling and extreme overnight trip in Colorado, head out on the Arkansas River for the 3 Day Mild to Wild trip!

These deals will not last forever, and they certainly won't be around this summer! If you are looking to take advantage of any of these deals, be sure to book by February 12th or risk expiration. See you on the river!
